00209     #define OS_SCHEDULER_POST_EVENT_HOOK() \
00210         do { \
00211             extern struct os_process os_event_alternate_proc; \
00212             extern struct os_process *os_current_process; \
00213             if (os_event_alternate_proc.next) { \
00214                 struct os_process *current_proc; \
00215                 os_current_process = &os_event_alternate_proc; \
00216                 current_proc = os_scheduler(); \
00217                 os_event_alternate_proc.next = NULL; \
00218                 return current_proc;\
00219             } \
00220         } while (false)
